mapper.update:
update natural_village
natural_village_code = #{naturalVillageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
natural_village_name = #{naturalVillageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
natural_village_address = #{naturalVillageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_household = #{totalHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_population = #{totalPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_concrete_road = #{isConcreteRoad,jdbcType=BIT},
is_domestic_electricity = #{isDomesticElectricity,jdbcType=BIT},
is_use_internet = #{isUseInternet,jdbcType=BIT},
total_poor_household = #{totalPoorHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_low_income_family = #{totalLowIncomeFamily,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_insured_household = #{totalInsuredHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
village_chief_id = #{villageChiefId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where natural_village_id = #{naturalVillageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update natural_village set natural_village_code = #{naturalVillageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, natural_village_name = #{naturalVillageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, natural_village_address = #{naturalVillageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_household = #{totalHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_population = #{totalPopulation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_concrete_road = #{isConcreteRoad,jdbcType=BIT}, is_domestic_electricity = #{isDomesticElectricity,jdbcType=BIT}, is_use_internet = #{isUseInternet,jdbcType=BIT}, total_poor_household = #{totalPoorHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_low_income_family = #{totalLowIncomeFamily,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_insured_household = #{totalInsuredHousehold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, village_chief_id = #{villageChiefId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where natural_village_id = #{naturalVillageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from natural_village
AND natural_village_id = #{naturalVillage.naturalVillageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND natural_village_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageCode},'%')
AND natural_village_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageName},'%')
AND natural_village_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageAddress},'%')
ORDER BY natural_village_id desc LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}

select count(*) from natural_village
AND natural_village_id = #{naturalVillage.naturalVillageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND natural_village_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageCode},'%')
AND natural_village_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageName},'%')
AND natural_village_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{naturalVillage.naturalVillageAddress},'%')
